organisation_name: European Association of Real Estate Professions (CEPI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The objective of the organisation is to be the main point of reference and convergence for European real estate professionals. It also contributes to the structure and develoment of European cross-border services and transactions of a mainly residential nature.
